Author: AllForMiner
Title: [ANN][ICO][Bounty] AllForMiner-Decentralization service platform for cryptominer
Body: https://a.radikal.ru/a27/1805/70/ba33bd96848f.jpg  AllForMiner       Decentralized service platform for cryptocurrency miners, plans to hold an ICO and expects that this will attract the attention of miners and sellers of equipment for mining. The purpose of this initiative is to give the miner the opportunity to withdraw the accumulated cryptocurrency into Fiat money or buy equipment for mining for small fees. Mining cryptocurrency in the first place, interested users from the point of view of possible material benefit. Markets and exchangers constantly increase the Commission on input and output of Fiat currencies.          AllForMiner proposes to reduce losses of miners by creating a new trading platform, where all goods will be sold for MinerToken. MinerToken is created on the Ethereum ERC20 contract. It can be exchanged in our online exchanger for the top 10 cryptocurrency, e-wallets and major Fiat currencies with the minimum possible fees. And MinerToken will be listed on the Markets.          AllForMiner is also going to launch the development and production of mining equipment using Ethash, Equihash and CryptoNight immersion single-phase cooling, as well as cooling units for ASICS and sell them in our Marketplace.  The sales start of ICO!!!Bonus +25%!!! Author: AllForMiner
Title: [ANN][ICO][Bounty] AllForMiner-Decentralization service platform for cryptominer
Body: In the center of the ecosystem AllForMiner are a trading platform and an online exchanger              AllForMiner-Trading offers a trading platform where any seller can put their goods for sale. All payments on the trading floor will be made for MIT tokens, without a fee and are protected by a refund guarantee.        AllForMiner-Exchanger online will exchange MIT for major cryptocurrencies and Fiat money at the average market rate and without Commission. Input of Fiat money to the exchanger wallet will be made from Bank cards and e-wallets without Commission. Withdrawal of Fiat money to e-wallets will also be without a fee, and to Bank cards with the minimum possible fees.

Author: AllForMiner
Title: [ANN][ICO][Bounty] AllForMiner-Decentralization service platform for cryptominer
Body: AllForMiner representations a cryptographic token open source MinerToken – MIT. MIT is a cryptocurrency that will be used to buy and sell cryptomining goods, as well as other AllForMiner services and future products. This currency will be used as a unit of account for all economic transactions in AllForMiner ecosystem and as a basis for interaction with other digital services.         MinerToken is a cryptocurrency with limited emission. It is not subject to long-term inflation. Tokens MIT equivalent and translatable, the sale of tokens on the cryptocurrency exchanges.         MinerToken implemented on the Ethereum blockchain platform in accordance with the ERC20.

Author: AllForMiner
Title: [ANN][ICO][Bounty] AllForMiner-Decentralization service platform for cryptominer
Body: When developing a trading platform AllForMiner-Trading, the main attention will be paid to the security of customers and reducing the risks associated with the volatility of the crypto-currency market.

Author: AllForMiner
Title: [ANN][ICO][Bounty] AllForMiner-Decentralization service platform for cryptominer
Body: Interaction between miner and seller           All payments between the miner and the seller on our trading platform AllForMiner–Trading will be carried out in MIT tokens. When making a transaction, the amount at MIT will be frozen on the trading platform's interim account and after confirmation of the transaction will be transferred to the seller. If within 45 days the buyer does not receive the goods or receives the goods that do not match the description, he initiates a refund procedure. To protect the seller and the buyer from inflation, they can fix the MIT rate to EUR at the time of payment, in this case, after the transaction is completed, they will receive MIT in the amount corresponding to the exchange rate to EUR at the moment.

Author: AllForMiner
Title: [ANN][ICO][Bounty] AllForMiner-Decentralization service platform for cryptominer
Body: Now we are experimenting with the composition of the liquid to achieve better cooling efficiency at higher boiling points to reduce volatility and eliminate the need to seal the housing. This will allow the use of graphics cards without coolers that will significantly reduce the size of the farm and almost completely eliminate noise
